# [Interview #403: AOL Chat 2, Entry #40](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=403#40)

#### Question

I was pleased to see
*Lord of Chaos*
appearing as a new bestseller in today's
*USA Today*
bestsellers list.

#### Robert Jordan

Thank you.
